title: Tout Terrain Releases Pinion Gearbox Trigger Shifter… Finally!
content:
One of the complaints about the Pinion gearboxes is the grip shifter. Sure, the Smart.Shift system uses a trigger, but then you’ve got to charge the unit and for long-distance expedition touring, many prefer to keep shifting analog. Tout Terrain just announced the Shift:R Trigger for the Pinion system and we’re panting over here…

The Tout Terrain Shift:R Trigger is designed for intuitive operation; the system features two stacked levers that are easily actuated with the thumb. This setup allows riders to enjoy the familiar feel of a traditional shifter while benefiting from the reliability and performance of a gearbox system.

Specs:

  • $389 for the entire kit, the shifter alone could be cheaper
  • These shifters should be arriving from Germany June 2025
  • Compatible with Pinion C-Linie Gearboxes
  • Diameter of the handlebar clamp: 22.2 mm
  • Material: AL 6061-T6 and AL 7075 for highly stressed components

See more at Tout Terrain.
